main event: A UFO sighting occurred on 10 Nov 59 in Phoenix, Arizona, lasting approximately 5 minutes where objects appeared pitch black but turned orange-white when tilted.
interesting points: Witness reported the object bobbed up and down and tilted when viewed from different angles., A response was received from the Air Force requesting more details on the sighting., The objects exhibited rapid movements and sudden changes in direction., Witness estimated the speed of the object to be around 4500 m.p.h., During the sighting, the object was seen hovering and moving with intelligence, suggesting it was not a conventional aircraft.
witness description: The witness was a housewife, aged 31, who observed the event and reported it to the Air Force.
